comment: I was totally blown off by the starting two episodes but then the comedy starts to wear off and will be boring for a while in the middle.

The Macgyer tv show reboot should take notes from this show because this is how you do it right. The cast is excellent, the story is good, and the atmosphere feels like it's part of the Lethal Weapon universe. They did a great job and made a terrific TV show.
Ohh Man!~ I love the classic quadrilogy. Glad this remake isn't a flop. This two have much chemistry and they bring out every details of the old cast.
Is well cast even if no one can replace the original actors. The show is still a fun adrenaline rush with some heart felt moments.
